name: Charter Hill
description: Charter Hill is one of the sub-districts of Westbrook, located in eastern Night City. Charter Hill is a relatively new and well maintained corporate district that was built from scratch during the Rebuilding period. It quickly became very popular among the upper-class citizens of Night City, this was before North Oak became hot within the next two decades. Nevertheless, most aspiring mid-level corpos work from sunrise to sunset in Westbrook or City Center, to then party in Japantown after a...
